00019 #ifndef COBASE_FILESEARCH_H
00020 #define COBASE_FILESEARCH_H
00021 
00022 #include <co/base/debug.h> // EQASSERTINFO macro
00023 #include <co/base/types.h>
00024 
00025 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00026 #  include <dirent.h>
00027 #endif
00028 
00029 #include <sys/stat.h>
00030 
00031 namespace co
00032 {
00033 namespace base
00034 {
00035 
00044 inline Strings searchDirectory( const std::string directory,  
00045                                 const std::string pattern )
00046 {
00047     Strings files;
00048    
00049 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00050 
00051     WIN32_FIND_DATA file;
00052     const std::string search = 
00053         directory.empty() ? pattern : directory + '\\' + pattern;
00054     HANDLE hSearch = FindFirstFile( search.c_str(), &file );
00055     
00056     if( hSearch == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE )
00057     {
00058         EQVERB << "Error finding the first file to match " << pattern << " in "
00059                << directory << std::endl;
00060         FindClose( hSearch );
00061         return files;
00062     }
00063 
00064     files.push_back( file.cFileName );    
00065     while( FindNextFile( hSearch, &file ))
00066         files.push_back( file.cFileName );    
00067     
00068     FindClose( hSearch );
00069 
00070 #else
00071 
00072     const size_t findPos = pattern.find( '*' );
00073     if( findPos == std::string::npos )
00074     {
00075         EQASSERTINFO( 0, "Unimplemented" );
00076         return files;
00077     }
00078 
00079     const std::string first = pattern.substr( 0, findPos );
00080     const std::string second = pattern.substr( findPos + 1 );
00081   
00082     DIR* dir = opendir( directory.c_str() );
00083     if( dir == 0 )
00084     {
00085         EQVERB << "Can't open directory " << directory << std::endl;
00086         return files;
00087     }
00088 
00089     struct dirent* entry;
00090     
00091     while(( entry = readdir( dir )) != 0 )
00092     {
00093         const std::string candidate( entry->d_name );
00094         if( candidate.find( first ) != 0 )
00095             continue; // doesn't start with filename
00096 
00097         const size_t end = candidate.rfind( second );
00098         if( end == std::string::npos ||               // not found
00099             end + second.size() < candidate.size( ))  // not at the end
00100         {
00101             continue;
00102         }
00103 
00104         files.push_back( entry->d_name );  
00105     }
00106         
00107     closedir(dir);
00108 #endif
00109     return files;
00110 }
00111 
00113 inline std::string getFilename( const std::string& filename )
00114 {
00115     size_t lastSeparator = 0;
00116     const size_t length = filename.length();
00117 
00118     for( size_t i = 0; i < length; ++i )
00119         if( filename[ i ] == '/' || filename[i] == '\\' )
00120             lastSeparator = i+1;
00121 
00122     return filename.substr( lastSeparator, length );
00123 }
00124 
00126 inline std::string getDirname( const std::string& filename )
00127 {
00128     size_t lastSeparator = 0;
00129     const size_t length = filename.length();
00130 
00131     for( size_t i = 0; i < length; ++i )
00132         if( filename[ i ] == '/' || filename[i] == '\\' )
00133             lastSeparator = i+1;
00134 
00135     return filename.substr( 0, lastSeparator );
00136 }
00137 
00138 }
00139 }
00140 #endif //COBASE_FILESEARCH_H
